name: Flick Golf 3D
description:
Welcome to Flick Golf, the world’s most addictive handheld golf game. “Flick Golf 3D delivers a polished, simple and accessible experience.” - Nintendo Life

Experience Full Fat’s award-winning ‘after touch’ controls for the first time on Nintendo 3DS™!

Flick, spin and curve your shots with pinpoint accuracy to sink the perfect hole-in-one. Adjust the ball in the air using the Nintendo 3DS™ Touch Screen. StreetPass™ with other Nintendo 3DS™ users to collect their high scores and challenge them to become a golf master!

Turn up the 3D Depth Slider to perfectly judge the position of the ball and hit the shots of your dreams.

“The graphics are among the cleanest we've seen from an indie dev...Full Fat deserves credit for optimising fully for Nintendo 3DS™.” - Nintendo Life

Beat challenging courses in Quickshot, compete for trophies in World Tour, or put your golf skills to the ultimate test in Quickshot Pro. Download Flick Golf 3D today!
